. Advertisement Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. People have said he'll fly backwards and forwards and do both. But he's not just a judge, he's also a mentor. That means he needs to stay in just one place. It's possible Simon Cowell will miss the UK version for a year and come back once the US one is settled in. Steve Jones is in the running to land the presenting gig on the US show ahead of Dermot O'Leary , who has made no secret of his desire to move Stateside.
